docs.lead_paragraph: Our advices from Brazil are to the 9th ultimo. The operations of the American Engineers upon the second section of the Pedro II. Railroad still occupied public attention. MIr. MIP.AD, the American Minister, had accompanied the President of the Company to the theatre of work.

docs.snippet: The matter of the contested seats being disposed, of the Democratic State Convention yesterday found no difficulty in accomplishing the business for which it was called together-the Softs, of course, having everything their own way. After some...
docs.lead_paragraph: The matter of the contested seats being disposed, of the Democratic State Convention yesterday found no difficulty in accomplishing the business for which it was called together-the Softs, of course, having everything their own way. After some preliminary business, the ticket was perfected, as follows:

headline.main: LATEST BY TELEGRAPH.; J. J. TAYLOR FOR LIEUT. GOVERNOR. Indorsement of the Administration of President Buchanan. CLOSING SCENES. Amasa J. Parker Nominated for Governor. Magnetic Telegraph Company's Offices--Nos. 43 Wall-street and Astor House. TRIUMPH OF THE TAMMANY MEN. THE DEMOCRATIC STATE CONVENTION.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Convention assembled at 9 o'clock, and the following were announced as the Committee on Resolutions: Messrs. J. B. Skinner, R. B. Connolly, H. S. Ketch um, Peter Cagger, Edwin Dodge, H. N. Johnson, P McDee, and Eli Cook. Mr. PARKER, of Delaware, reported in favor of the admission of HENRY W. EARLY as delegate from the Second District of Allegany.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Royal mail steamship Persia, H. E. JedEINS, Esq., Commander, from Liverpool at 3 1/2 P. M. on the 4th inst., arrived at this port last evening. Her news is of interest. The steamship Prince Albert, from New-York, arrived at Galway on the evening of the 1st inst. The Arago reached Southampton on the morning of the 2d.

headline.main: THE QUARANTINE TROUBLES.; EXAMINATION OF THE INCENDIARIES.

docs.lead_paragraph: A company of fifty Metropolitan Policemen were dispatched to Quarantine yesterday about 1 o' clock, under the supposition that their services would be needed, as it was rumored in the City that the rebels intended to celebrate the burning of the Hospitals, and possibly an attempt would be made to destroy the lately erected shahties.

docs.snippet: The Castleton Board of Health, at a late meeting, adopted an ordinance, prohibiting the Quarantine authorities from burying those who had died of infectious diseases in the Hospital burying ground which is located some two miles from the Quarantine,...

headline.main: QUARANTINE AFFAIRS.; Dispute about the Dead from the Hospital More Trouble for the Castleton Board of Health - The Encampment Yesterday - Examination in the Case of the Rioters - Important Meeting of the Commissioners of Emigration.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Castleton Board of Health, at a late meeting, adopted an ordinance, prohibiting the Quarantine authorities from burying those who had died of infectious diseases in the Hospital burying ground which is located some two miles from the Quarantine, and to reach which the hearse has to pass through a portion of two streets of the village of Tompkinsville.

docs.snippet: A curious Hebrew publication has just issued from the Berlin press-a biography of Alexander Von Humbolet, written in the ancient tongue, and destined to extend the knowledge of the life and scientific labors of this celebrated man in the wile circle...
docs.lead_paragraph: A curious Hebrew publication has just issued from the Berlin press-a biography of Alexander Von Humbolet, written in the ancient tongue, and destined to extend the knowledge of the life and scientific labors of this celebrated man in the wile circle of the Russe-Polish and Asiatic Jews. The full title is, " Alexander Von Humboldt. A Biographical Sketch. Dedicated to the Nestor of Wisoom on his 88th Birthday. By S. Slominski."

headline.main: QUARANTINE AFFAIRS.; The Milliary under an Easterly Wind--?? of Attorney-General Fremain to the Ruins--More Arrests--New Case of Yellow Fever--Meeting of the Castleton Board of Health--Dr. Mundy ?? &c. Commissioners of Health. Quarantine Grievances.

docs.lead_paragraph: The cool east wind of yesterday took away much of the romance that has hitherto surrounded affairs at Status Island. Thick overcoats were in demand among the Police, and the Military were self comp?? at the foresight which led them to adopt a thick uniform The prospect of an easterly storm caused many an anxious glance towards the wooden ?? which are happily now nearly completed and in which the meals are to be served.
